sentences.en: An exploratory operation is very important in the diagnosis of duodenal injury.
sentences.cn: 手术探查对十二指肠损伤诊断尤其重要.

sentences.en: Analogy is an exploratory and creative method in materials mechanics teaching.
sentences.cn: 类比法是材料力学中颇具探索性和创造性的一种思维方法.

sentences.en: At exploratory surgical operations, however, the unopened hydatid cyst should be excised.
sentences.cn: 然而, 在探查性外科手术时, 就应该把未开放的棘球蚴切除掉.

sentences.en: Exploratory surgery revealed her liver cancer.
sentences.cn: 探查性的外科手术查出她患了肝癌。

sentences.en: He announced formation of his exploratory committee on Tuesday.
sentences.cn: 他周二表明已经建立起他的竞选研究委员会.

sentences.en: He cautioned that the Russia - American discussions were still in an exploratory stage.
sentences.cn: 他警告说俄美会谈尚处于探索阶段.

sentences.en: He’s going to have exploratory surgery on his knee.
sentences.cn: 他的膝盖要做探查性手术。

sentences.en: I announced today that I am forming a presidential exploratory committee.
sentences.cn: 我今天宣布我正在组建总统选举委员会.

sentences.en: In December of 1971, an exploratory operation was performed and the news was not good.
sentences.cn: 1971年12月, 医生施行了一次探查手术,看来情况很不好.

sentences.en: Objective Exploratory investigation of normal value of the neonate myocardial enzymes.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨新生儿心肌酶的正常值.

sentences.en: The exploratory study is mainly with two purposes to be achieved.
sentences.cn: 本研究主要具有两个探索性的研究目的.

sentences.en: The project was subject to the usual vicissitudes of exploratory research.
sentences.cn: 该项目受到探索性项目不确定性的支配.

sentences.en: This exploratory, open - label, phase 1 - anti - HLA anti body levels and improve transplantation rates.
sentences.cn: 本项前瞻性 、 开放性、前1 、 2阶段、单中心的研究验证静注免疫球蛋白联用利妥昔单抗是否能够减少抗HLA抗体 的水平和提高移植成功率.

sentences.en: This paper presents exploratory research on fighting forms of an anti - satellite satellite.
sentences.cn: 摘要介绍了 反 卫星卫星攻击方式的探索性研究.

sentences.en: This research has revealed that composing is a non - linear and exploratory process.
sentences.cn: 此研究显示出写作是一非线性和探索性的过程.

phrases.tran_cn: 勘探开发；应用研究，探索研究

trans.tran_cn: 探索的，考察的，探索的，“explorative”的变体，试探性
trans.tran_en: done in order to find out more about something
